root.description: 钱包工坊是一个开源的多链钱包助记词生成器，支持一键生成 BTC、ETH(EVM)、TRON、SOL、BCH、SUI、DOGE 等主流公链。本工具完全前端运行，无需联网，安全可靠。  WalletCrafter is an open-source multi-chain wallet generator that supports one-click creation of wallets for major blockchains including BTC, ETH (EVM), TRON, SOL, BCH, SUI, and DOGE.The tool runs entirely on the frontend, no internet connection is required.
root.name: Walletcrafter_Extension
